issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] TPC-H Query 9
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11524](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11524). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fails with error "Cartesian joins are not supported". Seems that DataFusion can not convert it to a normal join (+filter).

`Error: NotImplemented("Cartesian joins are not supported")`
